  in 2021-2022 on contracts with RJG CONSTRUCTION. The average
  contract duration was 0.83 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.9M.
  The longest contract was 4.3 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $8.4M.
